nodes.text: A resistance force fought against the reconstituted Sith Empire on the planet Drezzi sometime prior to the year 3954 BBY. The Sith eventually conquered the world, and the husband of Queen Ressa of Drezzi was executed. In 3954 BBY, the Sith Pureblood Sechel told the story of Drezzi's fall to the Sith Lord Scourge.
The resistance force of Drezzi was indirectly mentioned in the 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, written by Drew Karpyshyn.
